# Install PCA operator

In this section you install operators for your team to use.

* Click on `Teams` tab

* Click on  `Crabs team`

* Click on `Library` tab

<center><img src="images/click_on_crabs_team_library.png"></center>

* Click on `+ Add operator`

<center><img src="images/click_on_add_operator.png"></center>

A list of operators available on the tercen library appears.

* Select the `PCA` operator

<center><img src="images/select_pca_operator.png"></center>

* Click `OK`

* The installed operator shows in the `Library` tab

<center><img src="images/view_pca_operator_done.png"></center>

You have now installed the `PCA` operator, the whole `crabs team` can now use it. The next section shows you how to upload data.
